description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，现任马来西亚第十任首相兼财政部长。
description.en: Malaysian politician, serving as the 10th Prime Minister and Minister of Finance of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四任及第七任首相，在安华的政治生涯中扮演了关键的提拔者、对手和盟友角色。
description.en: The fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia, who played pivotal roles as a mentor, adversary, and ally in Anwar Ibrahim's political career.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，安华·依布拉欣的妻子，曾任马来西亚副首相。在安华入狱期间，她领导了反对党运动。
description.en: Malaysian politician, wife of Anwar Ibrahim, and former Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia. She led the opposition movement during Anwar's imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，安华·依布拉欣与旺阿兹莎的长女。
description.en: Malaysian politician, the eldest daughter of Anwar Ibrahim and Wan Azizah Wan Ismail.

description.zh-cn: 安华·依布拉欣的父亲，曾是巫统国会议员和卫生部政务次长。
description.en: Father of Anwar Ibrahim, former UMNO Member of Parliament and Parliamentary Secretary to the Ministry of Health.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，曾任人民公正党署理主席，后与安华·依布拉欣发生政治斗争并退党，是2020年政治危机的关键人物之一。
description.en: Malaysian politician, former Deputy President of PKR, who later had a political falling out with Anwar Ibrahim and left the party, becoming a key figure in the 2020 political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 安华·依布拉欣的前助理，在2008年指控安华对其进行鸡奸。
description.en: A former aide to Anwar Ibrahim who accused him of sodomy in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 前马来西亚警察总长，曾在1998年安华被扣留期间对其进行殴打。
description.en: Former Inspector-General of Police of Malaysia, who assaulted Anwar Ibrahim while he was in custody in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十六任最高元首，于2022年11月24日任命安华·依布拉欣为第十任首相。
description.en: The 16th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia, who appointed Anwar Ibrahim as the 10th Prime Minister on November 24, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，现任巫统主席。在安华内阁中被任命为副首相。
description.en: Malaysian politician, current President of UMNO. Appointed as Deputy Prime Minister in Anwar's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，安华·依布拉欣的祖国，他在此担任过多个政府高级职位，包括副首相和首相。
description.en: A country in Southeast Asia, Anwar Ibrahim's home country, where he has held various senior government positions, including Deputy Prime Minister and Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的主要政党之一。安华于1982年加入该党，开始其政府官职生涯，后于1998年被开除。
description.en: A major political party in Malaysia. Anwar joined the party in 1982 to begin his career in government office, and was later expelled in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 由国民公正党和马来西亚人民党合并而成的多元种族政党，安华是该党的创始人物之一和现任主席。
description.en: A multiracial political party formed from the merger of the National Justice Party and the Malaysian People's Party. Anwar is one of its founding figures and its current president.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的政治联盟，安华为该联盟主席。该联盟在2018年大选中获胜，促成了安华的特赦。
description.en: A political coalition in Malaysia, chaired by Anwar. The coalition's victory in the 2018 general election led to Anwar's pardon.

description.zh-cn: 在烈火莫熄运动后成立的多元种族政党，后与马来西亚人民党合并为人民公正党。
description.en: A multiracial political party established after the Reformasi movement, which later merged with the Malaysian People's Party to form the People's Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个政党，于2003年与国民公正党合并，组成人民公正党。
description.en: A political party in Malaysia that merged with the National Justice Party in 2003 to form the People's Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 安华·依布拉欣的母校之一，他在此修读马来语研究，并曾担任学生领袖。
description.en: One of Anwar Ibrahim's alma maters, where he studied Malay Studies and served as a student leader.

description.zh-cn: 安华·依布拉欣的母校之一，他在1974年至1975年监禁期间在此修读文学硕士。
description.en: One of Anwar Ibrahim's alma maters, where he studied for a Master of Arts during his imprisonment from 1974 to 1975.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的最高法院。该法院在2004年推翻了对安华的第一次鸡奸罪判决，但在2015年维持了对他的第二次鸡奸罪判决。
description.en: The highest court in Malaysia. It overturned Anwar's first sodomy conviction in 2004 but upheld his second sodomy conviction in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于1997年的经济危机。在此期间，安华作为财政部长与时任首相马哈迪在应对策略上产生严重分歧，成为两人关系破裂的导火索。
description.en: An economic crisis that began in 1997. During this period, Anwar, as Finance Minister, had serious disagreements with then-Prime Minister Mahathir on response strategies, which became the catalyst for the breakdown of their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1998年安华被革职后，由其支持者发动的社会政治改革运动，促成了国民公正党的成立。
description.en: A socio-political reform movement initiated by supporters of Anwar Ibrahim after his dismissal in 1998, which led to the formation of the National Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 1987年马来西亚政府展开的大规模逮捕行动。安华时任教育部长，其派遣不谙华文教师至华小高职的决定是引发此次事件的导火索之一。
description.en: A large-scale arrest operation conducted by the Malaysian government in 1987. Anwar, then Minister of Education, his decision to send non-Mandarin-speaking teachers to senior positions in Chinese primary schools was one of the triggers for this incident.

description.zh-cn: 2014年人民公正党策划的一项政治行动，旨在通过制造州议席补选让安华进入雪兰莪州议会并出任州务大臣，但因安华被判鸡奸罪成而失败。
description.en: A political maneuver planned by PKR in 2014 to enable Anwar to enter the Selangor State Legislative Assembly and become Chief Minister through a by-election, which failed due to his sodomy conviction.

description.zh-cn: 导致希望联盟政府垮台的政治事件。在此次危机中，安华未能成功出任首相。
description.en: A political event that led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government. During this crisis, Anwar failed to become Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第15届全国大选，选举结果出现悬峙议会，经过数日协商，安华最终获任命为首相。
description.en: The 15th Malaysian general election, which resulted in a hung parliament. After several days of negotiations, Anwar was eventually appointed Prime Minister.

location.zh-cn: 马来亚联邦槟城威南县
location.en: South Seberang Perai District, Penang, Federation of Malaya

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪邀请安华加入巫统，开启了安华的政坛生涯。
description.en: Mahathir invited Anwar to join UMNO, launching Anwar's political career.

position.zh-cn: 教育部长、财政部长、副首相
position.en: Minister of Education, Minister of Finance, Deputy Prime Minister

description.zh-cn: 亚洲金融风暴期间，马哈迪与时任财政部长安华在经济应对策略上产生严重分歧，导致两人关系破裂。
description.en: During the Asian financial crisis, Mahathir and then-Finance Minister Anwar had serious disagreements on economic response strategies, leading to the breakdown of their relationship.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲金融风暴期间，时任财政部长安华与首相马哈迪在经济应对策略上产生严重分歧，导致两人关系破裂并最终导致其被革职。
description.en: During the Asian financial crisis, then-Finance Minister Anwar had serious disagreements on economic response strategies with Prime Minister Mahathir, leading to the breakdown of their relationship and his eventual dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 因1997年亚洲金融风暴意见不合，两人关系破裂，马哈迪随后革除安华职务。虽在2016-2020年间为推翻国阵政府而短暂结盟，但在2020年政治危机后关系再次决裂。
description.en: Their relationship soured over disagreements during the 1997 Asian financial crisis, leading Mahathir to dismiss Anwar. They formed a brief alliance from 2016-2020 to oust the Barisan Nasional government, but their relationship broke down again after the 2020 political crisis.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪宣布解除安华的副首相兼财政部长所有职位。
description.en: Mahathir announced the dismissal of Anwar from all his posts as Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 马哈迪革除安华职务的行为，直接引发了安华支持者上街示威，形成了“烈火莫熄”运动。
description.en: Mahathir's act of dismissing Anwar directly triggered street demonstrations by Anwar's supporters, forming the 'Reformasi' movement.

description.zh-cn: 烈火莫熄运动促使了新的多元种族政党－国民公正党的成立。
description.en: The Reformasi movement prompted the establishment of a new multiracial political party, the National Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 国民公正党和马来西亚人民党合并，组成人民公正党。
description.en: The National Justice Party and the Malaysian People's Party merged to form the People's Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚人民党和国民公正党合并，组成人民公正党。
description.en: The Malaysian People's Party and the National Justice Party merged to form the People's Justice Party.

description.zh-cn: 在安华被警方扣留期间，时任警察总长拉欣诺对其进行了殴打。
description.en: While Anwar was in police custody, then Inspector-General of Police Rahim Noor assaulted him.

description.zh-cn: 安华两次因鸡奸罪名成立而被监禁。
description.en: Anwar was imprisoned twice on sodomy convictions.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚联邦法院推翻了安华的第一次鸡奸案罪名，使其无罪释放。
description.en: The Federal Court of Malaysia overturned Anwar's first sodomy conviction, leading to his acquittal and release.

description.zh-cn: 前助理赛夫报警指控遭安华鸡奸，引发第二次肛交案审讯。
description.en: Former aide Saiful filed a police report accusing Anwar of sodomy, triggering the second sodomy trial.

description.zh-cn: 宣布辞去峇东埔国会议员职位，为丈夫安华重返国会让路。
description.en: Resigned as Member of Parliament for Permatang Pauh to pave the way for her husband Anwar to return to Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 旨在让安华出任雪兰莪州务大臣的“加影行动”，因安华第二次鸡奸案罪名成立而失败，他因此失去了参与补选的资格。
description.en: The 'Kajang Move', aimed at making Anwar the Chief Minister of Selangor, failed after he was convicted in his second sodomy case, disqualifying him from contesting the by-election.

description.zh-cn: 在希望联盟赢得2018年大选后，时任首相马哈迪促成对安华的特赦，使其重获自由。
description.en: After Pakatan Harapan's victory in the 2018 election, then-Prime Minister Mahathir facilitated a royal pardon for Anwar, securing his release.

description.zh-cn: 两人在公正党内部形成两大对立阵营，政治斗争逐渐加剧，最终阿兹敏率众退党，关系彻底决裂。
description.en: The two formed opposing factions within PKR, and their political struggle intensified, culminating in Azmin leading a group to leave the party, completely severing their ties.

description.zh-cn: 此次政治危机导致希望联盟政府倒台，安华在随后的权力竞争中未能成为首相。
description.en: This political crisis led to the collapse of the Pakatan Harapan government, and Anwar failed to become Prime Minister in the subsequent power struggle.

description.zh-cn: 大选产生悬峙议会，经过数日政治博弈，安华最终获得足够支持，被任命为马来西亚第十任首相。
description.en: The general election resulted in a hung parliament. After several days of political maneuvering, Anwar secured enough support to be appointed as the 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家元首，在2022年大选后的悬峙议会局面下，任命安华为马来西亚第十任首相。
description.en: As the Yang di-Pertuan Agong, he appointed Anwar as the 10th Prime Minister of Malaysia following the hung parliament situation after the 2022 general election.

description.zh-cn: 任命其女儿努鲁依莎为首相经济和金融高级顾问，此举引发了关于裙带关系的争议。
description.en: Appointed his daughter Nurul Izzah as Senior Advisor on Economics and Finance to the Prime Minister, a move that sparked controversy regarding nepotism.

description.zh-cn: 安华担任教育部长期间，指示教育部派遣不谙华文的教师出任华小高职，引发了华社的强烈抗议，成为茅草行动的导火索之一。
description.en: During his tenure as Minister of Education, Anwar's directive to appoint non-Mandarin-speaking teachers to senior positions in Chinese primary schools triggered strong protests from the Chinese community, becoming one of the catalysts for Operasi Lalang.
